title: When you're feeding as new Mordekaiser, and you spot a 3/15/4 Yasuo in your sights:

replies.body: But the yasuo had already got his 0/10 power spike .... how can you win?

> [{quoted}](name=Kei143,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0lMKWQXK,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-06-05T19:36:18.043+0000)
>
> But the yasuo had already got his 0/10 power spike .... how can you win?

Mordekaiser is the hardest counter of Yasuo of all, he psychologically destroys the player.

Yasuo players love being to show off their 'mad skillz'.

If you R them as Mordekaiser, not only does it take away their ability to weeb dash spam, but also takes their allies' ability to 'gawk at this marvel of skill', thus nullifying the Yasuo player's reason for being.
Someone is playing the 5D chess
11th-dimensional quantum chess
Bruh, practice QM and statistics. It simplifies most situations in quantum chess 90% of the time like counting cards. Symmetry also simplifies the board like in Kemplar's problem.  You got this.
Omg, it's all so clear.
how does it cancel the dashes part i thought it didn't affect minions or does it?
All other units disappear for the two players in his ult. That includes minions and monsters.
sounds broken
Ahaha ... I'm so using that when I pick Morde support into Yasuo.

Yasuo after dying/suiciding: "Come 1vs1 noob".
Mordekaiser: "Be my guest".

And with 2 items he will still 3 tap you with auto attacks so...

whenever I lose lane top, but my midlaner won their lane

and the enemy team decides to lane swap

so me the shit player gets matched with the enemy's shit player

You know, the original is a lot funnier... No need to make a cheap ripoff...

https://i.gyazo.com/88c42418f06e9bc0bf80e76e356ec704.jpg
sht thats cool meme.
3/15/4 seems oddly familiar, to be honest...
+1 for kung fu pandah
Wait what happens if Mord ults yas during yas ult???? MUST...FIND....OUT!

>

probably interrupts channels. since karthus, malzahar, syndra, fiddlesticks, etc. would be weird if it didn't.

I agree, but what happens to the targets yas is ulting?

5 bucks its bugged out lol.
But.... how can you possibly feed with new Mordekaiser?
*kills eachother at the same time*
{{sticker:sg-kiko}} HAHAHA XD
